Goth Steamy V2

Made for Streamer: SteamySnuggler

I'm Currently Open for Custom Sights Commissions, If you are interested send request to chrono1774 on Discord or leave a comment.

#sight #alltanks #anime #steamysnuggler #wtdraw

Gday fellas
My newest sight is currently in the works, plus I'm doing a bit of grinding in war thunder. But for now, for all you default sight enjoyers, I've just modified the default short range sight with the horizontal lines removed, but now with the logos from my three previous sights.

Inside the file has the three blk files that you simply drop in the game folder --> usersights --> all_tanks
the WTdraw files are there for you to modify the position and scale of the three logos, then you simply export as a .txt file, copy inside of the txt file and paste the lines on the .blk ...
#fnia #fexa #furry #sight #goonersight #wtdraw #alltanks

Here is my first custom sight – it features Marin!
I tried to keep it clean and optimized.
Hope you like it ;) #anime #sight #Marin #kitagawa #kitagawa_marin

半史实中国现代坦克电视瞄具 TV sights for Chinese modern tanks（semi historic）

此瞄具基于公开资料进行制作，也考虑到了美观上的要求，我认为主要是字体很好看。
可以通过b站看我的视频：
https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1joKNz3EhB/

This sight is made based on publicl information and aesthetic requirements.The fonk also looks good.
u can watch my video through bilibili:
https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1joKNz3EhB/

These Chinese word means:
（up）
装表工况 自动→Firing Data: Auto Regulating
（left）
炮控通讯通→Main Gun: Connected
车长通讯通→Commander: Connected
任务终端通讯通→Task Terminal: Connected
（down）
火控系统 开启→Firing Control System: ON
跟踪开关 关闭→Tracking: OFF

旋转防空瞄具 Rotatable AA sight

此瞄具可以用参考线对正敌机前进方向，以预估提前量。
虽然全部防空载具都可使用，但建议用于视野较为宽广的载具，远距离射击尤为高效。
你可以在b站上查找我的视频：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1nCMSz1E9u/


This sights can be used to align enemy aircraft's forward direction with a rotatable reference line, more convenient to estimate the lead time.
Thought it s for all AA units , i suggest u using this sight at AAs have a good vision.
Watch my video through bilibili: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1nCMSz1E9u/
